creator: Frank.Niessen@adobe.com
text:
A connection to a server with a md5 authentication but without a algorithm field
set would be rejected. Following RFC2617 it should fall back to md5.
(commons.httpclient.Authenticator.java::digest(), line 199)

There is a proposed patch in bug report 11527 for this, but it hasn't been 
committed.
creator: eurrow@sas.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 11527 ***
creator: ozeigermann@c1-fse.de
